TYPE.USERLIST_ID: In set and del modes, ulistid is mandatory
TYPE.USERLIST_NAME: In add mode, name of the userlist is mandatory
TYPE.USERLIST_SET_PARAMS: In set mode, name or uids is madantory
TYPE.SMTP_CONFIG: Your SMTP server configuration is invalid
TYPE.TO_MAIL: to must be an email address

GLOBAL.DESCRIPTION:
MyPads is an Etherpad plugin which have been founded in 2014 on Ulule by 413 backers and organized by the non-profit organization Framasoft. It handles :
  • users and their authentication;
  • folders of pads per user, unlimited, sharable;
  • attached pads, with choice between invite known users to use them, making them private with password or letting them public.

NOTIFICATION.ERROR_UNEXPECTED: An unexpected error has been raised. Please contact the administrator.

TAG.HELP: You can associate to this element as many tags as you wish

USER.USELOGINANDCOLORINPADS: Use login and color in pads?
USER.PLEASE_WAIT: Please wait, the service is currently loading.

INFO.LOGIN: The unique login you choose when you have subscribed
INFO.EMAIL: The email is required for password recovery
INFO.COLOR: The hexademical code for color you want to be used by default in pads
INFO.LANG: Your default browser configuration, depending on available languages on MyPads
INFO.USELOGINANDCOLORINPADS: Use login and chosen color in pads by default?
INFO.USECOLORINPADS: Use chosen color in pads by default?
INFO.PASSWORD_CHECK: For verification : must be the same as password
INFO.PASSWORD_CURRENT: Security check : required for all profile changes
INFO.REMOVE_ACCOUNT: Remove definitively your account and all the folders and pads on which you are the unique administrator
INFO.REMOVE_ACCOUNT_SURE: You are on the verge of removing definitively your account and all the folders and pads on which you are the unique administrator. If you are really sure about what you are doing, please enter your current password and click OK
INFO.PASSRECOVER_SUCCESS: You should have received an email to the address you have used when you subscribe. This email contains a Web address that is temporary valid. Please follow this url to change your password.
INFO.CHANGEPASS_SUCCESS: Your password has been successfully updated.
INFO.ACCOUNT_CONFIRMATION_SUCCESS: Your account has been successfully confirmed. You can now login.

ERR.EMAIL: The email is required and should be valid
ERR.COLOR: The hexadecimal code must be like #000000
ERR.LOGOUT: Log out error : you were not authenticated.
ERR.PASSWORD_MISMATCH: The entered passwords do not match.

AUTH.SUBSCRIBE_CONFIRM_SUCCESS: Successful subscription. An email has been sent to you in order to confirm your email address before you can login.

HELP.PROFILE:
Every change into your profile needs the current password field to be correctly filled. Please note that :

  • you can change everything by updating the appropriate field;
  • leaving password and password confirmation empty won't affect your current password;
  • you can't change your login at the moment but it will be possible in the future;
  • if you want to change your password, please enter the new one into the password field and confirm it with the password confirmation.

GROUP.HELP: Folders can contain pads. Here are your folders : those you have created, those you have been explicitly invited
GROUP.ADD_HELP:
Visibility

You have the choice between three levels of visibility. It will impact all linked pads:

  • restricted, default choice: access of the pads are limited to a list of invited users you have chosen;
  • private: in this mode, you have to enter a password and access to the pads will be checked against this password;
  • public: in this mode, all pads are public, users just need to have the URL address.

Readonly

If you check readonly, all attached pads will stay in their state, and can not be edited. Note that visibility still works in readonly mode.

Tags

You can attach tags to this element by clicking on the corresponding input field and selecting them one by one.

To create a new tag, fill it and type ENTER key or click on the 'Ok' button. Once the tag has been added, it will automatically been selected on this form.

You can remove a tag by clicking on the cross located on the right of it.
GROUP.VIEW_MANAGE: View and manage folder and its pads
GROUP.VIEW_HELP:
The details of the folder show you :

  • options defined when folder has been created or updated;
  • list of pads created for this folder;
  • and list of admins and users of the folder.

From there, you can :

  • create new pads, edit them, remove or mark them;
  • share administration of your folder with other users;
  • invite other users to view and edit pads of the folder.
GROUP.SHARE_LINK: Please share this URL to your guests
GROUP.SHARE_PASSWORD: Please enter the password to be able to share

INVITE_USER.HELP:
Userlists

You can select one or more userlists. Each click will add all members of the selected userlist to invited users.

Invite users

This field accepts one email or login at a time. When ENTER is typed, or OK is clicked, the filled data is added to the list of invited users. A list of known users helps you to fill the input.

Users

This list contains all selected users. You can remove one by clicking the sign after each item.

Note

Please note that, for instance, registered users will be automatically added to your folder. In short term, external users will receive a mail for creating an account.
INVITE_USER.INPUT_HELP: You can invite as many users as you want
INVITE_USER.SUCCESS: User invitation has been successfully achieved for
INVITE_USER.FAILURE: You can't invite users who have no account in this instance :

ADMIN_SHARE.SUCCESS: Administration sharing has been successfully achieved for
ADMIN_SHARE.FAILURE: You can't share administration with users who have no account in this instance :

PAD.PUBLIC_DENIED: Public access: you are not allowed to see this data.
PAD.ADD_PROMPT: Enter the name of the new pad
PAD.EDIT_PROMPT: Enter the new name of the pad
PAD.MOVE: Move all pads to another folder
PAD.MOVE_HELP:
Please select the wanted folder for your migration. Only folders on which you are admin are listed.

Once chosen, click on the submit button and wait for a moment.
PAD.VIEW_HELP:
Here is the main interface of the current pad.

If the folder or the pad is private, you need to enter the password to be able to access to it.

If you want to show the folder and if you have the permission to, you can click on the folder name.

INFO.NAME: Name

INFO.VISIBILITY: Required, restricted by default to invited users or admins
INFO.READONLY: If checked, linked pads will be in readonly mode
INFO.GROUP_PARAMS: By default, pad inherits from parameters of the folder they belong to. You can overwrite them if you want
INFO.REMOVE_SURE: Are you sure you want to remove this folder ?
INFO.RESIGN: Are you sure you want to resign from this folder ?
INFO.RESIGN_SUCCESS: You have left the folder successfully
INFO.PAD_REMOVE_SURE: Are you sure you want to remove this pad ?
INFO.PAD_MOVE: Select the wanted folder for your migration
INFO.PAD_MOVE_NOGROUP: Sorry but no other folder is available. You should create one before.
INFO.PAD_MOVE_SUCCESS: All pads have been successfully moved

ERR.NAME: The name of the folder is required

BOOKMARK.TITLE: My Bookmarks
BOOKMARK.HELP: Bookmark page offers you the ability to see all your bookmarked elements from MyPads. You can remove them from bookmarks if you want to.

USERLIST.HELP:
Here you can find all your userlists, ordered by creation date. Summary information are available with the name of each userlist and the number of users linked.

Through action icons, located on top right of each userlist, you can edit or remove lists. Details are available in the form view, via edit action.
USERLIST.FORM_HELP:
Name

You must give a name to the userlist, in order to be able to identify it.

Users

You can add as many users as you want. To do it, please enter the email or login and click on the 'OK' button. Note that already known users can be selected from the input.

To remove users, click on the cross located at the right of each user.

FIELD.NAME: Name
FIELD.USERS_HELP: Add as many users as you want
FIELD.USERSAREA_PLACEHOLDER: One email or login per line
FIELD.USERSAREA_HELP: You can add as many emails or logins you want

INFO.NAME: Name of the userlist
INFO.REMOVE_SURE: Are you sure you want to remove this userlist?
INFO.USER_INVITE: By selecting a userlist, you will invite all its users at the same time
INFO.USER_SUCCESS: User adding has been successfull for
INFO.USER_FAILURE: You can't add users who have no account in this instance :

ERR.NAME: The name of the userlist is required

ADMIN.HELP_LOGIN: MyPads administration is tied to Etherpad administration. Please enter an authorized login and password, as fixed into Etherpad settings.json to be able to update MyPads settings.
ADMIN.HELP_SETTINGS:
Settings

Only Etherpad admins have access this page. You can edit the global settings here and apply them. Changes will be effective directly.

Passwords

Be careful about password sizes : if you have existing accounts and raise minimum size or decrease maximum size, some user passwords may become unseizable.

Mail configuration

MyPads can verify the mails of subscribed users by sending them an email which will be used by them to confirm their address. Moreover, MyPads need email sending for password recovery.

Be cautious with SMTP configuration: bad parameters can lead to an Etherpad crash.

Please note that, unlike other parameters, SMTP settings are only applied after Etherpad reboot.
ADMIN.HELP_USERS:
This admin reserved page helps you to find users by entering their login. Once found, you will be able to edit or remove user.

For simplicity and performance reasons, we don't offer here a full listing of subscribed users.
ADMIN.HELP_USER_EDIT:
Here you can update all data associated to an existing user.

Please note that by default, leaving password empty means keeping the current password. If you want to change it, you have to fill password field and its confirmation.

FIELD.TITLE: Title
FIELD.USE_FIRST_AND_LAST_NAME_IN_PADS: Use first and last name of users as nickname in pads

INFO.LOGIN: The etherpad settings.json fixed admin login
INFO.TITLE: Global title displayed on your MyPads instance
INFO.ROOTURL: The root Web address used to access to Etherpad
INFO.HTMLEXTRA_HEAD: Custom HTML Code appended to tag <head>
INFO.LANGUAGE_DEFAULT: Default language for guest MyPads users
INFO.ALLOW_ETHERPADS: Allow classic anonymous pads from on the Etherpad instance, created from the root URL of the server
INFO.OPEN_REGISTRATION: Allow anyone to create an account (no effect if the LDAP authentication is set)
INFO.HIDE_HELP_BLOCKS: Help blocks shows in multiple MyPads pages, you can hide them with this setting
INFO.USE_FIRST_AND_LAST_NAME_IN_PADS: Force the use of first and last name as nickname in pads
INFO.CHECKMAILS: Check user mail given at subscription
INFO.TOKEN_DURATION: The time, in minutes, generated tokens are valid until users confirm their subscription
INFO.SMTP_HOST: Domain name where the SMTP Server belongs to
INFO.SMTP_SSL: Check it if you want to use an encrypted SSL connexion between MyPads and your SMTP Server
INFO.SMTP_TLS: Check it if you want to use an encrypted TLS connexion between MyPads and your SMTP Server
INFO.SMTP_USER: Optional: if authentication to the SMTP server is required, username
INFO.SMTP_PASS: Optional: if authentication to the SMTP server is required, password
INFO.SMTP_EMAILFROM: Email address to use to send emails from MyPads
INFO.NOCHANGE: Configuration have not changed, so no update has been sent
INFO.USERS_SEARCH_LOGIN: Please enter a login to search around database users
INFO.USER_FOUND: User found, please see options inside the form
INFO.USER_REMOVE_SURE: You are on the verge of removing definitively this account and all the folders and pads on which the user is the unique administrator. If you are really sure about what you are doing, please click on the OK button.

ERR.TITLE: Title is mandatory
ERR.PASSWORD_SIZE: Min size can't be higher than max size. Please check your numbers.
ERR.LANGUAGE_DEFAULT: A default language must be selected
